title: The Face of Evil
description: In this Dateline classic, when a 21-year-old student is found murdered along a Texas road, detectives begin to hunt for her killer. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 12, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
